result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Timothy J. Gallitz

records.addlTxt: Preliminary hearing on November 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.
ec: DA and Atty De La Rosa (10/17/22--ma)
Proposed Order Granting Stipulation to Adjourn
Stipulation to Adjourn PH
Preliminary hearing on October 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.

[ma] Cases 22CF14, 22CF12, 22CF13 called together at 4:09 PM 
Defendant Amanda L Buri in court.  Attorney Richard S Burris in court for Amanda L Buri.  
Defendant Timothy Gallitz in court. Attorney Jeffrey De La Rosa in court for Timothy Gallitz
Defendant Andrew Louis Schuld in court. 
Attorney Theresa A Beck in court for State of Wisconsin. 

The Court reviews court record. 

Upon inquiry of the Court, Mr. Schuld indicates that he still wishes to have counsel appointed. 

No objection to an adjournment by ADA Beck.

The Court appoints an attorney to Mr. Schuld's case at no cost to the Defendant. 

Scheduling is discussed. 
recess: 4:14pm 
NEXT: (1)Appoint Counsel for Mr. Schuld (2)As to ALL Cases, Preliminary Hearing on 10/20/22 at 9:00am
Status conference on September 9, 2022 at 03:30 pm.

[ma] Case called at 3:26 PM 
Defendant Timothy J. Gallitz in court with Attorney Jeffrey Jacob De La Rosa.  Krysta Parson appears for the State of Wisconsin.

The Court reviews the court record. 

Atty De La Rosa requests Mr. Gallitz's case to track co-defendants; to allow time for negotiations. 

recess: 3:27pm
NEXT: Status on 9/9/22 at 3:30pm
Status conference on July 7, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Pre-trial conference on June 22, 2022 at 02:40 pm.
Status conference on July 7, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

[ma] Case called at 9:06am 
Defendant Timothy J. Gallitz in court with Attorney Jeffrey Jacob De La Rosa.   ADA Theresa Beck appears for the State of Wisconsin.

The Court reviews the court record. 

Atty De La Rosa suggests scheduling a pretrial and status. 
recess: 9:09am 
NEXT: (1)Pretrial on 6/22/22 at 2:40pm (2)Status on 7/7/22 at 2:30pm
Signed on 4/21/22; Rec'd from Stanley Correctional on 5/27/22

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Att De La Rosa
Unsigned Signature Bond faxed to Stanley Correctional with fax confirmation
Status conference on June 13, 2022 at 09:00 am.

[ml] Cases 22CF12 and 22CF13 called at 8:41AM
Defendant Timothy J. Gallitz appears from the Stanley Correctional Facility, in custody by audio/video means.
Defendant Andrew Schuld in court, in custody without counsel.
ADA Jeffrey Shock appears for the State of Wisconsin.
These hearings are scheduled for Preliminary Hearings for both Defendants, however neither Defendant has been appointed counsel.

Upon Court inquiry, Defendant Gallitz advises that he has submitted his application to the PD's Office. Defendant Schuld advises that he has not submitted an application for the PD's Office because he has been in custody in the Jefferson County Jail.

The Court proposes scheduling these matters for Status of Counsel. 

Mr. Gallitz inquires about a Bond reduction. The Court advises that it will take this matter up at the next scheduled hearing.

recess 8:49AM

NEXT: 
In both files:
Status Conference (also Status of Counsel) on 06/13 at 9:00AM
Not yet appointed counsel
Detainer Acknowledgemnt from DOC
Scheduling Order
Unsigned Signature Bond--Defendant refused to sign
Fax Transmittal to Stanley Correctional with Bond Document for Administration
Notice of Court Order
Preliminary hearing on April 5, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Conditions of Bond include: 


--no contact with [Co-Defendant] Andrew Schuld (*  Direct or indirect contact prohibitions include but are not limited to phone calls, letters, emails, texts, social media, other electronic means and no one can contact the person on your behalf except an attorney.) 
--no contact with Margaret Gordon (*  Direct or indirect contact prohibitions include but are not limited to phone calls, letters, emails, texts, social media, other electronic means and no one can contact the person on your behalf except an attorney.) 
--no discussion of the facts of the case with [Co-Defendant] Amanda Buri outside of the presence of counsel
- no possession or consumption of controlled substances without a valid prescription;  to take prescription medications only as prescribed
--no possession of drug paraphernalia

[MK] case called at 8:43am.
Defendant Timothy J. Gallitz appears by telephone from Stanley Correctional Institution.  ADA Barbara Michaels appears for the State of Wisconsin.  
Service of Complaint admitted, reading waived, the #4, #5, #6, #7 charges and maximum penalties are recited
Right to counsel given. Mr. Gallitz indicates that he wishes to be represented by counsel.  The Court directs the clerk to inform the Jefferson Public Defenders Office that Mr .Gallitz would like PD application paperwork mailed to him. 
Preliminary Hearing time limits are waived by both parties.
The Court finds probable cause to exist in the Criminal Complaint 

The Court requires a $5,000 Signature Bond, with conditions: 
--no contact with [Co-Defendant] Andrew Schuld 
--no contact with Margaret Gordon
--no discussion of the facts of the case with [Co-Defendant] Amanda Buri outside of the presence of counsel
- no possession or consumption of controlled substances without a valid prescription;  to take prescription medications only as prescribed
--no possession of drug paraphernalia 
recess 8:52am 


NEXT:   (1) clerk- add DOC #584068 to party information (Mr. Gallitz indicated he will be incarcerated until 6/7/22),  (2) clerk- notify the PD that Mr. Gallitz is requesting to have PD application paperwork mailed to him, for a PD eligibility determination,   (3) Preliminary Hearing on April 5th at 8:30am (along with Co-Defendant's case)
Per Judicial Rotation Order - co-actor with pending
NOTE: Copy of complaint mailed and faxed to Timothy at Stanley Correctional Inst. on 02/16/2022. (NMS)
